evidence.claim: The company mentions X12 and EDI standards relevant for healthcare integration.
HMMC references FHIR and HL7 in their documentation regarding data standards.
Information on healthcare compliance and HIPAA regulations are presented on HMMC's security page.
There are job postings that require understanding of healthcare standards including HITECH and HIPAA.

icp.icp_reason: HMMC focuses on manufacturing rather than direct health data exchange.
